eduversum.name: KPlato
eduversum.description: KPlato is a program to plan and manage projects and it is part of the KOffice-Suite. KPlato offers resource management, a hierarchical calendar, tasks with dependencies and sub-tasks, diagram creation, planing of project's deadline (pessimistic, expected, optimistic), a project-structure-plan (PSP), a 'critical path with resources' and embedding in other KOffice-applications.
